document.masterDocTitle: Dung beetles (Coleoptera, Scarabaeinae) from high-altitude grasslands in São Joaquim National Park, Santa Catarina, southern Brazil

caption.paragraph: Table 2. Details on dung beetles sampled in high-altitude grasslands of São Joaquim National Park, Santa Catarina, southern Brazil. Abbreviation: SU = sex undetermined.
